title: Black loading screen
body: Does anyone else get a black loading screen like this? When the league game client opens up it looks normal, after I go onto another window and come back it has everything blacked out. Only the text survives.  I also want to know how to fix this as it is annoying if I want to know what runes the enemy champs have and I cant see it.

replies.body: i have the same issue too

Heyo, thank you for the report! We're looking into this now. We've been refactoring and fixing up some old rendering code, and it looks like this may have been caused by that work.

Does this impact your game at all, or does it just look bad when you're tabbing back in? Just checking to make sure that the game is still loading and rendering correctly.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=P26OEgoZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-30T00:08:48.910+0000)

> Heyo, thank you for the report! We're looking into this now. We've been refactoring and fixing up some old rendering code, and it looks like this may have been caused by that work.

This doesn't seem to affect my gameplay. It is just really annoying when I can't see the runes. Although only one time today, out of 5 games, I could not join the game after I was at 100%. I had to restart the client in order to load in the game, which was 3 minutes after it started.

I have a question as well, why does loading screen not load? Basically it freezes on launcher, I know it's not my net, so it's on your end. More and more people are reporting these issues, I myself have 20min queue times in EUW, because I can't start the game and I get punished by Leaver Buster. What's that about?

I'm not sure. It sounds like you're having a hardware/software specific issue. Does this happen to you regularly? What kind of hardware setup do you have? Can you provide a DxDiag of your system? Can you link your .rpd Performance logs from a recent game?

I experienced the same problem, the game loaded correctly for me. 

However in my last lobby it wouldn't let me select anyone to ban, then froze when the countdown hit 0. 

After that I relogged and it wouldn't let me hit play to get into another game.
Oof, that sucks. I don't think that's related to this issue, but we are working on some investigation related to the champ select problem that you described.
Can u fix the stutter issue??
Same bug. Main issue is you can't see the spinning wheel to know if you're frozen or just getting slow loaders.
Can confirm, me and my friends have gotten the bug. Always happens when alt + tabbing to a different window then going back to league.
